description: This file defines the ProfilePage component, a React functional component responsible for displaying and editing a user's profile information within a web application. It manages local state for profile fields, interacts with external APIs and context providers, and renders a form for user interaction.

methods.name: normalizeSocials(obj)
methods.description: A helper function that normalizes the socials object, currently returns the object as-is for valid inputs.

methods.name: ProfilePage()
methods.description: Main React component for the user profile page enabling view/edit functionality.

methods.name: onSave
methods.description: Handles form submission to save updated profile data, including validation and API interaction.
